§ 7252. Service credit: regular enlisted members; service as an officer to be counted as enlisted service An enlisted member of the Regular Army is entitled to count active service as an officer in the Army as enlisted service for all purposes. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 211, § 3684; renumbered § 7252, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 808(b)(9), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1838.)
